title: 3D models reveal why bigger bumblebees see better

title_detail.value: 3D models reveal why bigger bumblebees see better

summary: By generating 3D images of bumblebees' compound eyes, researchers have discovered how bumblebees differ in their vision. The results could contribute to increased knowledge about the pollination process - once researchers are able to determine which flowers different bees see easily, and which ones they find it harder to distinguish.
